page.title: 17Lytham St. Annes - Amenities
page.content: Category 15. There are two convalescent homes situated on Clifton Drive opposite the Nature Reserve. Category 18. There are two post offices,one on St.David's Rd.North,the other on Cavendish Rd. Categories 19,20,21. The shops are situated on St.Andrew's Rd.North and St.Davids Rd.North. Category 28. There are two garages with servicing,M.Chadwick's on St.David's Rd.and Performance Motors on St.Leonard's Rd. Category 32. St.Annes Old Links Golf Club. St.Annes Lawn Tennis Club,on Avondale Rd.Fylde Sand Yacht Club. Category 37.Ashton Gardens. Category 48.Some of the houses around Ashton Gardens are used as holiday homes. Category 50. St.Margaret's Church is situated on St.Leonards Rd.West.
